headline: KKR & Co. Inc. (KKR) Builds Scale Across Markets and Sectors
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is one of the high-growth, low P/E stocks to buy now. On February 10, KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) presented at the Bank of America Financial Services Conference, where CFO Rob Lewin highlighted strengths in asset management, insurance, and strategic holdings, while noting challenges in real estate. The firm expects […]
